onBoardingSubTitle1:
Make your life full of amazing events and unforgettable occasions.
Evntown is your ultimate guide to discovering and organizing the best events, from parties and conferences to festivals and seminars.
All events are now at your fingertips!
onBoardingSubTitle2:
Easy Event Discovery:Find all kinds of events in one place.
Perfect Organization:Create your own event and attract the ideal audience.
Unique Experience:Enjoy a wonderful blend of entertainment and networking.
Start now and join the most exciting event world!
pleaseEnterValidPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, and a number
pleaseEnterValidEmailAddress: Please enter a valid email address
pleaseEnterValidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number.
youCantSelectMoreThan5Interests: You can't select more than 5 interests.
typeYourRegisteredEmailToReceivePINCode: Type your registered email to receive PIN code.
noCategoriesFoundTryAgainLater: No categories found, try again later.
welcomeToSpinAndWin: Evntown Game Page: Spin and Enjoy Winning!
earnEverydayachancetowinafreeeventticket: Earn every day a chance to win a free event ticket. Collect points now after spinning the wheel.
spinAndWinInstructions: Welcome to the exciting Evntown Game! Get ready to test your luck on the Wheel of Fortune! Every 24 hours, you get a new chance to win amazing prizes.
redeemButtonActivation: When you reach 1000 points, the redeem button will be activated!
redeemTicketInstructions: You will fill a form to redeem your ticket. You can select up to 3 events. Select the most priority favorite events. You will get the ticket by priority. If the first priority is sold out, you will gain the second priority, etc.
joinOurGreatEvents: Join our great events in Evntown. Enjoy your favorite event for free!
addToCalendar: Ready to attend? Save to Calendar
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteYourAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
tryAgainQ: Do you want to try again?
areYouSureYouWantToLogout: Are You Sure You Want To Logout?
eventCreatedSuccessfulySub: Your event is under review and will be approved by the admin shortly. Stay tuned!
organizerCreatedSuccessfullySub: We will contact you soon to collaborate on upcoming events. Stay tuned!
feelingLuckyTestYourFortuneOnOurGameWhee: Feeling lucky? Test your fortune on our game wheel! Gather points with every spin to win tickets to upcoming events.
gameStep1: 1- Spin the Wheel! Every day, head over to the Wheel of Fortune and spin it to collect your points. Each spin can give you points or other awesome rewards!
gameStep2: 2- Collect Points! The more you win, the more points you gather. These points contribute towards your progress to the grand prize! Keep playing and start collecting points every day.
gameStep3: 3- Enter the Draw! Once you reach 1000 points, you can enter the draw to win a free ticket to any event of your choice! Your chances of winning grow more exciting with every point you collect.
whyPlayReasons:
A Daily Chance! You have a chance to win every 24 hours, so don't miss out!
Excitement in Every Spin! You never know what fortune has in store for you!
Real Prizes! With 1000 points, you'll get a chance to win a free ticket to a special event!
Are you ready to try your luck? Spin the wheel now! Good luck and we hope you win big!
